definitions.definition: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
examples: my sister told me that she was not happy

definitions.definition: used to refer to a ship, vehicle, country, or other inanimate thing regarded as female.
examples: I was aboard the St. Roch shortly before she sailed for the Northwest Passage

definitions.definition: used to refer to a person or animal of unspecified sex.
examples: only include your child if you know she won't distract you
she who rocks the cradle rules the world
is that a he or a she?
